data.text: @d4ddy221 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

data.text: @AndrewTeh18 We suggest that you delete your personal information for security reasons and send us via DM instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

@AndrewTeh18 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to refund or make any alterations to your ticket.
@AndrewTeh18 We would like to inform you that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and original conditions of your ticket.
@AndrewTeh18 Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@brigittajulia Any passenger whose ticket has been affected by the flight cancellation can learn more information and proceed to make an adjustment to the ticket at https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn.
@Selina01351298 We suggest you get the link https://t.co/d1axd1fTyn to request a travel voucher or extend ticket validity to your ticket.

@Seb45239047 @shsshy We are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@kiwiradar We have sent you a message.
@kiwiradar Greetings, may we contact you via DM?
@kennyfookg You can send an email to net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com or our office at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@Selina01351298 Greetings, may we ask you have sent to which e-mail address?

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Flights to Thailand & More | THAI
urls.description: Thai Airways has service to 35 countries and offers online flight booking to popular domestic Thailand and International destinations.

data.text: @kennyfookg Hello, kenny.  If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency. However, If you booked directly with https://t.co/mWPXQYhi4Q We suggest you  send an email to net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com or our office at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@aaronstanga Hello, Aaron. If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@sovereigndean  We are sorry for the inconvenience.

@sovereigndean We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@sovereigndean Due to a lot of people who contact us, our staff will respond to your queue as soon as possible. Once again, we are sorry for the inconvenience.
@sovereigndean However, we would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@sovereigndean We would like to inform you that as our social media team we do not have authorized to access the information.

@sovereigndean We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@sovereigndean Greetings, due to the large number of people who contact for refunding, the bank will operate to your queue as soon as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@necrophage32 Sorry, in this case, you have to contact your agency in order to refund or make any alterations to your ticket.

data.text: @Abhilas84169925 We suggest that you delete your booking information for security reasons and send us via inbox instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.

@necrophage32 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to refund or make any alterations to your ticket.
@wordsbymilsryan Due to the large number of people who contact us, our staff will respond to your queue as soon as possible. We are sorry for the inconvenience.

@GuillaumeDellaS In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to refund or make any alterations to your ticket.
@GuillaumeDellaS Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@ImogenHartPR We are sorry for the inconvenience.
@ImogenHartPR We would like to inform you that in this case our staff will process the queue as soon as possible. Please wait for the process from our staff again.

@ImogenHartPR We do apologize for the inconvenience. As we are a social media team, we cannot specify the time of each replying issue via email. After they have done the process of investigation, they will reply back to you directly as soon as possible.

@ImogenHartPR We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.

@jasongraham99 @nusatrip We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.
@jasongraham99 In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, we suggest that you wait for a reply from your agency.
@anupamchawla_ They will reply back soon.
@anupamchawla_ Due to the high volume of requests, we seek your understanding as it may take longer than usual for us to respond to you. We apologise for any inconvenience caused.

@anupamchawla_ We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@SammFewandFar Greetings. We already following you. Could you please Direct Message to us, we will reply to you via Direct Message.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: Songkran Festival comes with Thai tradition of visiting one's family and paying elders respect with scented water. But with this year's challenge of COVID-19 and social distancing, many Thais have made some adaption to conduct the tradition online. 👉🏻 https://t.co/LH8T2otlZd https://t.co/4qZQlCjd6I

@TonsTweetings ทางทีมงานใคร่ขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกมา ณ โอกาสนี้
ทั้งนี้เราขอเรียนว่าเรามิได้นิ่งนอนใจที่จะนำข้อเสนอแนะของท่านไปปรับปรุงการให้บริการ เราขอน้อมรับข้อเสนอแนะที่ท่านแจ้งมาให้ทราบในกรณีการเปลี่ยนแบบของเครื่องบินและเก้าอี้โดยสารชั้นธุรกิจ (Royal Silk Class) ค่ะ
@SMPHLS ขออภัยในความไม่สะดวกนะคะ เนื่องด้วยขณะนี้มีผู้ติดต่อเป็นจำนวนมากซึ่งตามที่ท่านแจ้งให้ทราบว่าได้ส่งเรื่องไปแล้วนั้น โปรดรอการติดต่อกลับจากฝ่ายบัตรโดยสารค่ะ
@Kittykatnoble Greetings, Due to the large volume of visitors, the waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience caused by this opportunity.
@Galaxyyarena Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket which has been purchased with the agency.
@Galaxyyarena Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@siwapor64240133 สวัสดีค่ะ สำหรับในกรณีดังกล่าวท่านผู้โดยสารสามารถติดต่อเพื่อขอรับข้อมูลเพิ่มเติมได้ที่  THAI Contact Center 02-356-1111 หรือติดต่อผ่านช่องทางอีเมลได้ที่  contact@service.thaiairways.com ค่ะ
@pratik_1245 Greetings, due to the large volume of people who come in, the service waiting period may be slower than usual. We apologize for any inconvenience this opportunity may cause.
@RickBar83192380 The terms and conditions of the ticket will be considered and how long the refund will be processed will depend on the queue after the agency has coordinated with the airline.

@tody_muc If you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@robeenobambeeno We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@_prabhat @goibibo It would depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket. Please contact the agency directly for further information.
@RickBar83192380 It would be dependent on the terms and conditions of your ticket. Please contact the agency directly for further information.
@robeenobambeeno Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@RickBar83192380 Passengers have to contact the travel agency and the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case.

@ShellOnTheVerge We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@RickBar83192380 Greetings, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket. Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@tody_muc Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?
@livieheath We suggest that you wait for the reply from our ticketing department. Our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible
@SammFewandFar Greetings, we invite you to please send us a private message with your booking reference so we can better advise and please delete your booking reference on this post.
@livieheath Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@Thai_landese We would like to inform you that refunds can be made by contacting any THAI ticketing office in your city of departure city at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR. Please be informed that the possibility of a refund will depend on the terms and conditions of your ticket.

@livieheath We would like to recommend that you contact via email at contact@service.thaiairways.com and net.flightrsvn@thaiairways.com by informing the following information
1. Name-Surname (English)
2. Reservation Code 
3. Flights and travel dates
4. Intent
@DannyQ_BPH You are welcome.
@DannyQ_BPH If there are any updates or progress towards this issue, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible.
@DannyQ_BPH Greetings, we are truly sorry for the late response from our related department. Please be informed that, normally, the process of investigation does take some time.
@majokolonomo ขอภัยในความไม่สะดวกเป็นอย่างสูงนะคะ เนื่องด้วยขณะนี้มีผู้ติดต่อเป็นจำนวนมากจึงไม่สามารถระบุเวลาที่แน่นอนได้ เจ้าหน้าที่จะติดต่อท่านกลับโดยเร็วที่สุดค่ะ
@ranmoor_tom Greetings, due to the high volume of requests, we seek your understanding as it may take longer than usual for us to respond to you. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

data.text: @AsencioPak We suggest that you delete your booking information for security reasons and send us via inbox instead so we can keep you posted. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
@JeffEva97776100 Greetings,  we suggest that you contact our THAI local offices near you for more information. You may find contact details at https://t.co/p86rp7UJpR
@FranklyChels We would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.
@FranklyChels And, the travel agency will coordinate with the airlines directly for this case. Sorry for the inconvenience.

@FranklyChels The booking that is made by the travel agency, if the passengers would like to cancel, they have to contact the travel agency who issued the tickets and completed the payment in their system.
@Ishurajghimire4 Happy Songkran 2020 😍
@FranklyChels Please note that fees may be applied depending on the terms and conditions of your ticket.
@FranklyChels In this case, we would like to inform you that, if you have booked your ticket through an agency, you have to contact your agency in order to make any alterations to your ticket.

Happy Songkran 2020 and Happy Thai New Year!

THAI wishes you and your loved ones tremendous strength to withstand the current difficult time, and also great happiness throughout the year and beyond. https://t.co/Nxp6jRH9Eh
@FranklyChels Greetings, may we inquire whether you had booked your ticket from an Agency or directly with Thai Airways?

@leahhjay_ We would like to inform you that the investigation process takes some time. If there are any updates, our officers will get back to you as soon as possible. We are really sorry for your inconvenience.

@majokolonomo ไม่ทราบว่าหมายถึงไม่ได้รับอีเมลตอบกลับใช่ไหมคะ ไม่ทราบว่าอีเมลที่ส่งไปคือ net.flightrsvn ตามที่แจ้งเลยไหมคะ
@e_glueck @downy888 Please contact your agency about this issue.

May this sacred day bring forth a swift end to the current crisis and a new, bright, and happy beginning for us all afterwards. https://t.co/ZmdGthj3NF
